step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a little straighter in the next repetitions.
You're doing well raising your hands towards your forehead. Focus on keeping your elbows closer together as you move them up.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
You're holding the stretch well. Ensure your shoulders stay relaxed and you're not tensing up.
Great job reversing the motion. Remember to keep your wrists aligned as you return to the starting position.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Focus on keeping your wrists straighter and elbows closer as you move your hands up. Remember to keep your head up and avoid pulling forward during the stretch.
